title: Synplant 2 is Absolutely Wild (Part 1 of 2)
description:
Synplant 2 is a SUPER unique software instrument that can generate and mutate sounds from samples (amongst other things). I think it's bonkers. Let's check it out and throw a ton of sounds at it to see how it fares.
Part 2 here: https://youtu.be/X47HVv0smO8
Completely functional 3-week demo of Synplant: https://soniccharge.com/synplant
